name: DUTASTERIDE
cautions:
Cautions 
(From Dutasteride and finasteride: British National Formulary)
Cautions Dutasteride and finasteride decrease serum concentration of prostate cancer markers such as prostate-specific antigen; reference values may need adjustment. Both dutasteride and finasteride are excreted in semen and use of a condom is recommended if sexual partner is pregnant or likely to become pregnant. Women of childbearing potential should avoid handling crushed or broken tablets of finasteride and leaking capsules of dutasteride.; interactions: Appendix 1 (dutasteride)
doses:
500 micrograms daily, review treatment at 3–6 months and
then every 6–12 months (may require several months treatment before
benefit is obtained)
